name: Galaxy equalizer
description:
IMPORTANT HOW TO PLAY THAT I FORGOT 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The number in the top left is your swords energy

When it runs out your sword goes back in

The top bar is your EXP

The bottom bar is your health

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made for the Brackey game jam 2022

All code and art done by me besides galaxy background

Music made by William Rosati

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

In this game you play as a space ship blasting aliens in outer space.

You can pick 3 different upgrade paths and modify your ship as needed

The theme is incorporated because aliens are not real (cheap I know)

Have fun and I hope you enjoy!!
